section1.title: SHIPPING
section1.content1: We ask our customers to allow us 3-5 business days of processing time to assemble your order before it ships.
section1.content2: We offer complimentary shipping on all orders over $99 CAD
section1.footnote: Please note, orders must have a subtotal of $99 CAD or more before taxes, fees and discounts to be eligible for free shipping. Additional restrictions may apply.
section1.content3: We are only shipping orders within Canada at this time. International shipping will be available very shortly, please join our newsletter to stay up to date.
